articles.title: Congratulations to Prime Minister of UK
articles.content:
Congratulations to Prime Minister of UK
						
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to David Cameron upon his re-appointment as prime minister of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland.
					 The message expressed belief that the relations between the two countries would develop on good terms, wishing him success in his work for the development of the country.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a similar message to Philip Hammond upon his re-appointment as foreign secretary of the UK on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister Meets New Spanish Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets New Spanish Ambassador 
						
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minster Ri Su Yong met and had a talk with Gonzalo Ortiz Diez-Tortosa, Spanish ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him on Wednesday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Minister of Thailand
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Foreign Minister of Thailand
						
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Tanasak Patimapragorn, deputy prime minister and concurrently foreign minister of Thailand.
					 The gift was handed to an official concerned on Tuesday by head of a delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Thailand Don Pramudwinai, vice-minister, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Thai Foreign Ministry Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Thai Foreign Ministry Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Thailand led by Deputy Minister Don Pramudwinai visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The guests looked round historic relics preserved with much care, being briefed on the revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung who was born at the straw-thatched house and spent his childhood, cultivating his great intention for revolution.
					
					 The delegation also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, Chongryu Junior Middle School in Taedonggang District, the Mirim Riding Club, the Munsu Water Park and other places.
					
					 It gave a reception on Wednesday on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Thailand.

articles.title: Anniversary of Establishment of Diplomatic Relations between DPRK and Thailand Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Establishment of Diplomatic Relations between DPRK and Thailand Marked 
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- There took place a film show at the Chollima Hall of Culture on Wednesday to mark the 40th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Thailand.
					 Present there were So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, members of DPRK-Thailand Friendship Association, officials concerned, working people in the city and members of a delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Thailand led by Deputy Minister Don Pramudwinai.
					
					 They watched a Thai feature film.

articles.title: Foreign Businesses to Boost Cooperation with DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Businesses to Boost Cooperation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The 18th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair goes on in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea with attendance of many home and foreign businesses.
					 Businessmen from various countries, including Russia, New Zealand, Germany and Malaysia, have expressed their will to strengthen the economic cooperation with the DPRK.
					
					 Boris Stupnitsky, president of the Primorsky Chamber of Commerce and Industry, Zaytsev Dmitry of the Export Development Center of Primorsky Territory and Igor Agafonov, deputy representative of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Russia, told KCNA at the fair:
					
					 We attach weight significance to the international trade fair in Pyongyang.
					
					 That's why we are here at this fair with an unprecedentedly big delegation. Among the delegation are firms engaged in meat processing, construction and bean production.
					
					 Their intention is to develop Russia's commercial relations with the DPRK through detailed survey of its trade situation.
					
					 We realized, through the autumn trade fair held here last year, that the DPRK has great potentials. 
					
					 We have a long-term plan for economic cooperation with the DPRK and this vast plan will be carried into practice without fail. Next year more businessmen will come here from Russia.
					
					 The city of Pyongyang has undergone a radical change. The development speed of Pyongyang, beautiful and covered with green foliage, took us by surprise. This would have been unthinkable without the guidance of the leader of the DPRK, we dare say.

articles.title: Public Presentation of Scientific and Technological Achievements in Agro-chemical Sector Held
articles.content:
Public Presentation of Scientific and Technological Achievements in Agro-chemical Sector Held
						
Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- A national public presentation of scientific and technological achievements in the agro-chemical sector took place at the Grand People's Study House on Tuesday and Wednesday under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					It brought together scientists, technicians, teachers, researchers and postgraduate students in the agro-chemical sector including the State Science and Technology Commission, the State Academy of Sciences, the Academy of Agricultural Science, Kim Il Sung University and Kim Je Won Haeju University of Agriculture.
					
					Its participants heard dozens of valuable papers presented by various units.
					
					They introduced achievements and experience gained in studying and introducing varieties of fertilizers and agricultural chemicals through a dynamic drive for breaking through the cutting edge science and technology in the agro-chemical sector.

articles.title: Anniversary of Youth Shock Brigade for Speed Campaign Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Youth Shock Brigade for Speed Campaign Observed
						
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The Youth Shock Brigade for Speed Campaign is observing its 40th anniversary. 
					 Leader Kim Jong Il took a step of organizing a new form of youth brigade in the 1970s and named it Youth Shock Brigade for Speed Campaign.
					
					 He made sure that its inaugural ceremony and a torchlight procession were held at Kim Il Sung Square with splendor.
					
					 He personally came out to the venue of the events and reposed deep trust in it by saying that it was the might and pride of the Workers' Party of Korea to have such ranks of loyalists as the shock brigade.
					
					 Its members have performed miracles and innovations in socialist construction sites under his warm loving care since its birth.
					
					 The shock brigade has reached a higher stage in its development thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un ushering in a new heyday of the youth movement, true to President Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's idea of attaching importance to the youth.
					
					 Kim Jong Un regarded not only the Korean People's Army but also the shock brigade as major forces for ushering in a great heyday of construction and indicated the orientation and way of building up the brigade better and led it to fully demonstrate its might in major construction projects with loving care.
					
					 The shock brigade has performed proud feats over the past four decades, true to the noble intention and deep trust of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 It has undertaken at least 200 construction projects to perform heroic feats. It was awarded Order of Kim Il Sung and Order of National Flag First Class, more than 20 members received the title of labor hero and more than 130 became recipients of Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize.

articles.title: Production of Steel Wire Flexible Shaft Localized in DPRK
articles.content:
Production of Steel Wire Flexible Shaft Localized in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The Coal-mining Engineering Institute of the Coal Science Branch under the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK recently succeeded in localizing steel wire flexible shaft.
					 The institute invented a new type of flexible shaft coiling machine and established a technology of producing steel wire flexible shaft with locally available raw materials.
					
					 The introduction of this steel wire flexible shaft is conducive to improving the level of mechanization in coal mining and raising the speed of tunneling.

articles.title: Natural Monuments at DPRK's Koryo Songgyungwan Academy
articles.content:
Natural Monuments at DPRK's Koryo Songgyungwan Academy
						
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- In the compound of the Koryo Songgyungwan Academy in Kaesong City of the DPRK there are Zelkova serrata and Ginkgo biloba which are about 1 000 years old.
					 Kaesong was the capital of Koryo (918-1392), the first unified state in Korea.
					
					 When visiting the academy in May Juche 81 (1992), President Kim Il Sung said that those trees should be preserved with care as the nation's natural monuments.
					
					 Zelkova serrata is 25 meters in height, 5.32 meters in girth and 18 meters in diameter of crown while Ginkgo biloba 31 meters, 5.31 meters and 27 meters.

articles.title: Big Efforts Paid to Hygienic and Anti-epidemic Work in DPRK
articles.content:
Big Efforts Paid to Hygienic and Anti-epidemic Work in DPRK 
						
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has always put importance on hygienic and anti-epidemic work.
					 In this regard, Jang Chun Il, an official of the State Sanitary Inspection Board, told KCNA:
					
					 In our country the hygienic and anti-epidemic institutions are playing a big role in implementing the line of prophylactic medicine advanced by the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 Strict measures have been taken to prevent the country from worldwide epidemics.
					
					 The National Hygienic and Anti-epidemic Center has steadily input the latest information on infectious diseases to its database, so as to intensify information exchanges with hygienic and anti-epidemic institutions throughout the country.
					
					 Meanwhile, relevant institutions have actively conducted hygienic information service activities among residents.

articles.title: "Paekok"-trademarked Koryo Medicines
articles.content:
"Paekok"-trademarked Koryo Medicines
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- "Paekok"-trademarked traditional medicines, produced by the Korea Jangsaeng Joint Venture Company of the DPRK, have gained popularity at home and abroad.
					 In this regard, Jo Hyon, director of the company, told KCNA that the "Paekok"-trademarked medicines won top prizes at international exhibitions held in Vietnam and China.
					
					 The medicines are now exported to China, Cambodia and Mongolia.
					
					 The company is also planning to send doctors specialized in Koryo therapy to other countries and make varieties of health products with medicinal herbs as raw materials.
					
					 It exhibited dozens of kinds of medicines at the 18th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair now underway.
					
					 The company is located in Okryu-dong No. 1, Taedonggang District, Pyongyang.

articles.title: DPRK's People Rage at Japanese Police's Fascist Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
DPRK's People Rage at Japanese Police's Fascist Suppression of Chongryon 
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Another fascist outrage committed by the Japanese reactionaries against officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) is arousing bitter anger among DPRK citizens.
					 On May 12 morning, the Japanese policemen under the joint investigation headquarters stormed the houses of the president and some officials of the Korean Speciality Sales Company, handcuffed them in the presence of their family members and made a forcible search.
					
					 In this regard, Mun Ho, director of the Ministry of Railways, told KCNA:
					
					 Japanese reactionaries' suppression of Chongryon is getting evermore undisguised. Chongryon is a dignified organization of overseas DPRK citizens.
					
					 The illegal arrest of them is aimed at tarnishing the image of Chongryon and, furthermore, defaming the DPRK.
					
					 It can be clearly evidenced by the fact that the police forcibly walked away Koreans, who have no connection with the case of contravention to "Foreign Currency Law" made by the Oriental Co. Ltd., while misleading public opinion as if Chongryon had involved in it.
					
					 Han Song Chol, a teacher of Kim Chaek University of Technology said:
					
					 The fascist outrage against Chongryon is a clear human rights abuse, national discrimination against Korean residents in Japan.
					
					 But a spokesperson of the Japanese prime minister's residence patronized such inhuman outrage committed by the police. This shows that the arrest was made at the connivance of the Japanese authorities and Japan, which styles itself "law-governed state", is nothing but a police state.
					
					 Jon Song Thae, a worker of the Pyongyang General Printing Plant, said:
					
					 What matters is that the arrest was made at a time when the 60th founding anniversary of Chyongryon is drawing nearer. Therefore, it is as clear as noonday that the Japanese authorities have sinister intention to throw a wet blanket over the celebrations to be held on the occasion by fanning up anti-Chongryon and anti-Korean feelings among the Japanese.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should immediately release Chongryon officials and punish those responsible for the suppression.

articles.title: DPRK Will Mercilessly Punish Those Keen on "Human Rights" Racket against It: Minju Joson
articles.content:
DPRK Will Mercilessly Punish Those Keen on "Human Rights" Racket against It: Minju Joson
						
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Foreign Ministry on May 4 announced that the UN "office for human rights in north Korea" is expected to be opened in Seoul within June. It was reported that every arrangement would be over if the procedures for it have been taken in south Korea.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Wednesday says that the above-said office is an anti-DPRK plot-breeding mechanism cooked up by the U.S., south Korean puppet forces and all other followers to stifle the DPRK at any cost under the pretext of its non-existent "human rights" issue.
					
					 The ultimate aim of the U.S. to see the office set up in south Korea is to impair the prestige of the dignified DPRK and realize its scenario for invading it at any cost.
					
					 The puppet group in south Korea is the top class criminals who have turned it into tundra of human rights and a dark land as a colonial stooge of the U.S. It is ridiculous, indeed, for it to stage a despicable and strange burlesque over inviolable human rights.
					
					 The DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the moves of all enemies to defame the dignity of the DPRK and bring down its social system.
					
					 It will never pardon but mercilessly punish those hell-bent on the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket, whether they are the puppet forces or their masters or those going under the mask of any international body.

articles.title: Minju Joson Flays U.S. Development of Latest Weapons
articles.content:
Minju Joson Flays U.S. Development of Latest Weapons
						
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. navy recently conducted a long-distance refueling test for drone model X-47 capable of taking off and landing on a carrier. It is talking volumes about the results of the test, asserting that it would widely use data collected through the test for the companies manufacturing drones for carriers.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Wednesday says this proves that the U.S. is poised to step up the development and use of drones in the future, defying the international protest and denunciation, and remains utterly indifferent to the sovereignty of other countries and people's lives.
					
					 It is the only preoccupation of the U.S. to realize its ambition for dominating the world by force of arms, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is going in the direction of increasing the proportion of drones in its system of weaponry in the future. What is noteworthy is that the U.S. drone development is closely related to the strategy for "rebalancing in the Asia-Pacific Region".
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that the U.S. will put greater spurs to developing not only drones but all types of latest weapons.
					
					 It is only innocent people who will fall victim to the "latest weapons" developed by the U.S. It has grown corpulent at the cost of the people's blood and it is dreaming of achieving prosperity in the future, too.
					
					 The U.S. is, indeed, the enemy common to mankind and heinous human rights abuser as it is disturbing global peace and blocking human development.
					
					 It should stop at once killing people, obsessed by the ambition for world domination.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare Aim Sought by U.S. in Revised "U.S.-Japan Defense Cooperation Guidelines"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lays Bare Aim Sought by U.S. in Revised "U.S.-Japan Defense Cooperation Guidelines"
						
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is claiming that the revision of the "U.S.-Japan defense cooperation guidelines" is aimed at coping with someone's "provocations and threat" and ensuring "peace" in the Asia-Pacific region. This is, however, hypocrisy.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. is to use the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" as a shock brigade in its operations to encircle and contain China and Russia, its rivals in Eurasia, by force of arms and realize its scenario for dominating the world.
					
					 It is the invariable ambition of the U.S. to dominate the world. To this end, the U.S. put forward the pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy.
					
					 China and Russia are increasing their influence on Northeast Asia with great military and economic potentials.
					
					 But the U.S. is getting weak. It is practically impossible for the U.S. to carry out its scenario for dominating the world under the present situation.
					
					 The U.S. is trying to offset such weakness by tightening the military alliance with its allied forces. It is attaching particular importance to the military alliance with Japan.
					
					 The military muscle of Japan is so strong that it can match other western powers.
					
					 Precisely for this reason the U.S. is working hard to retain its firmer grip on Japan through tightened military alliance, while encouraging the latter to revive militarism.
					
					 The ulterior design of the U.S. is to use the Japanese reactionaries as a shock brigade in the operations to contain China and Russia by taking advantage of their militarist hysteria.
					
					 By revising the above-said guidelines the U.S. can hurl the SDF into its military operations anywhere in the world.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Stop Cooperating with Foreign Forces against Compatriots
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Stop Cooperating with Foreign Forces against Compatriots
						
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The present south Korean regime has become ever more undisguised in its bad habit of visiting foreign countries to slander fellow countrymen in the north and ask for their cooperation in the campaign against it, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 The article recalls that the south Korean chief executive implored Latin American countries for "cooperation in pressurizing the north" during her visits to them, the south Korean puppet authorities held sinister confabs with outsiders over the nuclear issue and that they are going more reckless in the smear campaign against the DPRK over its "human rights issue".
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 As long as the south Korean regime persists in these acts, it is impossible to expect the dialogue between the north and the south and to improve the inter-Korean ties.
					
					 Cooperating with foreign forces is an unpardonable criminal act as it stokes distrust and confrontation between the north and the south.
					
					 Such cooperation is a revelation of flunkeyism and the consciousness of confrontation with compatriots. Attaching importance to the relations with foreign forces enforcing a hostile policy towards the DPRK, and depending on it are a clear manifestation of the distrust of the fellow countrymen in the north and the hostility towards them. 
					
					 The U.S. is the architect of the split of the Korean nation and a vicious disturber of national reunification.
					
					 Our nation must pool its efforts in the struggle against the U.S. keen to start another war of aggression on the Korean peninsula while standing in the way of reconciliation and unity of the nation and independent reunification of the country.
					
					 This is the way of protecting the nation's interests.
					
					 However, the south Korean regime is persistently clinging to the sleeves of the U.S. for its cooperation in the moves to stifle the DPRK, while turning away its face from the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 This is an act of treachery to destroy the foundation and cornerstone for the development of the inter-Korean ties and make the destiny of the nation a plaything for foreign forces.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Japan of Trying to Repeat Its Past Crime-woven History
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Japan of Trying to Repeat Its Past Crime-woven History
						
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The chief executive of Japan in a recent lecture during his tour of the U.S. labeled the victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army "victims of flesh traffic". He made it clear that he would not use the expression of aggression and apology in a statement he is to make public on the lapse of seven decades since Japan's defeat in World War II.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says what he uttered was not prompted by his gaffe or lack of knowledge.
					
					 The victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army were not victims of "flesh traffic" but those of the sexual slavery enforced by the Japanese imperialists in a systematic and organized manner with government and military power involved, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 This is a stark historic fact and a hideous crime against humanity which can neither be concealed nor written off.
					
					 The chief executive of Japan is working hard to deny and gloss over its past history and evade the blame for it by crafty wordplay.
					
					 What matters is that it has become the general trend of the Japanese society to deny and tamper with history. The political and public circles are vying with each other to distort history. They are imbuing the younger generation with outlook on the distorted history.
					
					 Japan's moves to deny and distort history are not a simple academic issue. It is a sensitive political issue of whether Japan admits its past crimes or not and whether it has the will to reflect on its past crime-woven history and liquidate it or not. Nevertheless, it persistently refuses to admit its crimes, desperately trying to evade the blame for its past wrongdoings.
					
					 It is the ulterior aim of Japan to repeat its past crime-woven history.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Revolutionary and Noble Mental and Moral Traits of Young Korean People
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Revolutionary and Noble Mental and Moral Traits of Young Korean People  
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The beautiful traits fully displayed by the Korean youth in the annals of revolution and construction are now in fuller bloom in the new century of Juche, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an editorial.
					 It goes on:
					
					 Intensive loyalty to the party and the leader, the spirit of devoted service to the country and its people and revolutionary and moral obligation towards the forerunners of the revolution and comrades are the characteristic features of the young Korean people.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il regarded the work of educating and training young people in the whole period of their revolutionary leadership as an important affair decisive of the future destiny of the country, the revolution and the nation and directed great efforts to it.
					
					 They trained millions of fine young people who firmly trusted and followed the party only, not affected by any evil idea and degenerate bourgeois lifestyle. This was one of the greatest feats performed by them and a precious legacy left by them for the victorious accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche.   
					
					 The revolutionary noble mental and moral traits of the Korean youth which were formed and consolidated under the care of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il have reached a new high level under the experienced leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The rise and fall of a country and nation hinge on the young people who will carve out the future.
					
					 The socialist country will as ever powerfully demonstrate the spirit and might of the strong and prosperous country thanks to the large unit of the young people who remain loyal to their leader only, hold their country dearest, warmly love human beings and unhesitatingly devote all wisdom, enthusiasm and lives to the work for living up to his loving care.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Japanese Police's Fascist Actions
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Japanese Police's Fascist Actions
						
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries' crackdown on the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).has reached its height since its formation.
					 At dawn of Tuesday the Japanese police authorities hurled the joint investigation headquarters consisting of police headquarters in Kyoto, Kanagawa, Yamaguchi and Shimane prefectures into the fascist action of arresting all of a sudden the manager of the Korean Specialty Sales Company, the son of the chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee and other person.
					
					 This unprecedented fascist action is a provocation against the DPRK and Chongryon, prompted by their sinister political motive without any legal ground.
					
					 It was taken on the basis of lies and fabrication.
					
					 Those three persons arrested have nothing to do with the so-called case of the Oriental Co. Ltd. and it has been confirmed through various channels that they have never imported even 0.001 gram of Songi mushroom of the DPRK origin.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese police authorities illegally arrested them in the wake of the search for the houses of the chairman and a vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee after hyping the above-said case. This goes to fully prove that the Japanese reactionaries are escalating the racket against the DPRK and Chongryon on charges of the "violation of law".
					
					 The DPRK had already made it clear that the suppression of Chongryon, a dignified overseas citizens organization of the DPRK, is a sensitive issue which will lead to the encroachment on its sovereignty.
					
					 The recent action is an unpardonable provocation against the DPRK and a grave infringement upon its sovereignty as it took place in broad daylight in Japan styling itself "a law-governing state" and "democratic state."
					
					 The Japanese government authorities were behind the illegal violent action.
					
					 They recently revised the U.S.-Japan "defense cooperation guidelines," expanding the sphere of overseas military operations of the "Self-Defense Forces." Japan is joining the U.S. in its frantic campaign against the DPRK in a bid to prepare a springboard from which to carry out its scenario for turning Japan into a military giant.
					
					 To this end it is working hard to check the influence of Chongryon representing the DPRK in Japan, stir up the sentiment for lurch to the Right based on national chauvinism and thus create a political environment for reviving militarism.
					
					 The persecution of Chongryon is an act of inviting self-destruction as it is pushing the DPRK-Japan relations to the worst phase.
					
					 Absolutely unpardonable are the Japanese reactionaries who have committed all sorts of wrongs against guiltless Chongryon and Koreans in Japan, far from making an apology and reparation for the heinous crimes committed by Japan against the Koreans though seven decades have passed since the end of World War II.
					
					 The Japanese government authorities will be wholly responsible for their actions to encroach upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and stamp out Chongryon.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams U.S.-Japan "Defense Cooperation Guidelines"
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams U.S.-Japan "Defense Cooperation Guidelines"
						
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and Japan have recently revised the "defense cooperation guidelines".
					 The guidelines specify operations of the U.S. forces and the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" (SDF), their intelligence sharing, logistic support and sharing of their roles in contingency.
					
					 What is noteworthy is that they have been revised under the pretext of coping with the DPRK's military "threat" and "provocations".
					
					 They were laid down in 1978 for the first time, presupposing "invasion by the Soviet Union." They were revised in 1997 under the pretext of coping with the ballistic missiles of the DPRK, contingency on the Korean peninsula, etc.
					
					 This time the U.S. and Japan cited the DPRK's military "threat" including its ballistic missiles as major pretexts for revising the guidelines.
					
					 The U.S. secretary of Defense and Japan's minister of Defense in a joint press conference blared that they needed a new level of alliance to cope with diverse security threats including provocations of north Korea.
					
					 This is no more than shameless rhetoric aimed to cover up the real nature of the tightened alliance for aggression and war.
					
					 The guidelines are a product of the scenario of the U.S. and Japanese reactionaries to carry out their strategy for stifling the DPRK and invading Asia through their military nexus.
					
					 The gravity of the guidelines is to expand the sphere of overseas military operations of the SDF.
					
					 The guidelines call for expanding the sphere of joint military operations of the SDF and U.S. forces worldwide by revising the geographical conception of "situation in surrounding areas" as the "situation exerting major influence" which poses potential threat to peace and security of Japan. 
					
					 They allow Japan to dispatch SDF anytime in contingency on the Korean peninsula for joint military operations with the U.S. forces.
					
					 The U.S. secretary of Defense said the core of the new guidelines eliminated the geographical limit to the U.S.-Japan military cooperation, adding that cooperation between the two countries would escalate into internet and space.
					
					 The revised guidelines would result in increasing the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and putting peace and security in Northeast Asia at great peril.
					
					 They make it possible for the SDF to openly advance into the peninsula in a bid to realize its ambition for overseas expansion under the zealous patronage of the U.S.
					
					 The structure of confrontation in the region including the peninsula is gaining in depth and the danger of a new arms race and military conflict is increasing due to the war policy pursued by the U.S. and the policy of Japan, its ally.
					
					 Those who revised the guidelines had better drop their short-sighted way of thinking.
					
					 The alliance for war will bring nothing but disaster.

articles.title: U.S. Schemes to Deploy Armored Brigade in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Schemes to Deploy Armored Brigade in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is mulling bringing the 2nd Armored Combat Brigade of the 1st Armored Division of the Third Corps to south Korea under the pretext of rotation deployment, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 It was reported that the brigade received training and education for actual war in California State.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers to Stage Large-scale War Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers to Stage Large-scale War Drill
						
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The 12th Division of the south Korean puppet army announced that it would stage a large-scale field mobile drill in Rinje and Yanggu counties, south Korean Kangwon Province, the forefront areas, from May 13, according to south Korean KBS.
					 It was reported that the drill simulating an all-out war will last till May 20.

articles.title: S. Korean Police Suppress Memorial Service for Victims of Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Suppress Memorial Service for Victims of Ferry Sewol Disaster
						
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime is going all the more reckless in the suppression of the memorial service for the victims of the ferry Sewol disaster and demonstration.
					 The fascist police are busy with a full investigation into these actions to find a clue to those "illegal" actions while taking issue with the memorial service and demonstration.
					
					 The Jongro Police Station in Seoul on May 6 summoned Pak Rae Gun, co-chairman of the All-People Measure Council for Ferry Sewol Disaster, for questioning on charge that he spearheaded the memorial service.
					
					 The police also issued summons to other co-chairmen of the organization.

articles.title: Immorality and Corruption Rampant in S. Korea
articles.content:
Immorality and Corruption Rampant in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Unimaginable immorality and corruption are getting serious day by day in rotten and ailing south Korea.
					 A man in his thirties beat his mother to death in Songdong District, Seoul on May 6.
					
					 In Ulsan on May 4 a woman strangled the father of her friend.
					
					 A brother and his sister attempted to kill their father for property in Sachon, South Kyongsang Province on May 1.
					
					 Pupils of primary schools are making violent remarks and the number of children manhandling their parents is increasing day by day.

articles.title: Chongryon Assails Japanese Police Authorities' Fascist Action
articles.content:
Chongryon Assails Japanese Police Authorities' Fascist Action
						
 Tokyo, May 13 (KNS-KCNA) -- The Central Measure Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued a statement on Tuesday to denounce the Japanese reactionaries for illegally suppressing Chongryon officials.
					 At dawn of Tuesday the joint investigation headquarters consisting of police headquarters in Kyoto, Kanagawa, Yamaguchi and Shimane prefectures raided the houses of the manager of the Korean Specialty Sales Company and others and arrested them and searched their houses, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Such suppression was committed at a time when the sentiment of all Koreans in Japan to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the formation of Chongryon is running high. 
					
					 Lurking behind this is a cynic ploy of the Japanese authorities to create an undesirable atmosphere in the Japanese society by tarnishing the image of Chongryon and labeling it an "illegal organization" and "criminal organization".
					
					 A spokesperson for the prime minister's residence made reckless remarks patronizing the joint investigation headquarters, creating the impression that its action was taken on a legal ground. This fully exposes that the arrest was committed at the instigation of the Japanese authorities.
					
					 The statement said that the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan will brilliantly adorn the 60th anniversary of Chongryon by dint of single-minded unity, rallied close around Chongryon, and thus powerfully demonstrate the validity of the patriotic cause and the might of Chongryon.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries Illegally Arrest Chongryon Officials
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries Illegally Arrest Chongryon Officials
						
 Tokyo, May 13 (KNS-KCNA) -- On Tuesday morning the policemen of the joint investigation headquarters consisting of police headquarters in Kyoto, Kanagawa, Yamaguchi and Shimane prefectures stormed the houses of the manager of the Korean Specialty Sales Company and others who are officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and walked off them.
					 They searched the houses for hours in a bid to find out evidence.
					
					 The Japanese police authorities committed such violence, asserting that they were related to the Oriental Co. Ltd's alleged violation of the "law on foreign exchange".

articles.title: Lecture and Film Show in Guinea
articles.content:
Lecture and Film Show in Guinea
						
 Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- A lecture and film show introducing the scientists streets successfully built in the DPRK under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un took place in Guinea on Apr. 28.
					 Present there were personages of a company and other people of Guinea.
					
					 The chief of the administration management and construction project of the company said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un guided the construction plan and designs of Unha Scientists Street and went to the construction site several times to  take all necessary steps. He also unfolded a plan to build modern scientists street in Unjong science area where the State Academy of Sciences is situated.
					
					 Going round the construction site of apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University, he opened up the prospect for building apartment houses for teachers and researchers of Kim Chaek University of Technology.
					
					 Encouraged by his particular love and trust, all the scientists and technicians of the DPRK are achieving latest scientific and technological successes.
					
					 The participants of the lecture watched a Korean film "Pyongyang Today".

articles.title: Tiene lugar presentacion nacional de exitos cientifico-tecnicos de ramas agricola y quimica
articles.content:
Tiene lugar presentacion nacional de exitos cientifico-tecnicos de ramas agricola y quimica
Pyongyang, 13 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar los dias 12 y 13 en el Palacio de Estudio del Pueblo la presentacion nacional de los exitos cientifico-tecnicos de las ramas agricola y quimica bajo los auspicios del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Ciencia y Tecnica de Corea. 
					Participaron los cientificos, tecnicos, profesores, investigadores y cursantes de instituto doctoral del Comite Estatal de Ciencias y Tecnicas, la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, la Academia de Ciencias Agricolas, la Universidad Kim Il Sung, el Instituto Superior de Agricultura Kim Je Won de Haeju, etc.
					
					En la ocasion se expusieron decenas de disertaciones preparadas por varias unidades.
					
					Los participantes presentaron los exitos y experiencias adquiridos en estudiar y aplicar los abonos, productos agroquimicos, etc. en la investigacion cientifica mediante la campana para conquistar el nivel sofisticado de la tecnologia.

articles.title: Empresarios rusos expresan voluntad de intensificar cooperacion economica con RPDC
articles.content:
Empresarios rusos expresan voluntad de intensificar cooperacion economica con RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 13 de mayo (ACNC) -- Esta en plenitud la Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias Primaveral de Pyongyang.
					Tomaron parte en la presente feria las companias nacionales y las empresas extranjeras equivalentes a 3 veces mas en comparacion con la anterior feria.
					
					Los empresarios de varios paises inclusive Rusia, Nueva Zelanda, Alemania y Malasia expresaron su voluntad de activar mas las cooperaciones economicas con la RPDC.
					
					En exclusiva con la ACNC, Boris V. Stupnitsky, presidente  de la Camara de Comercio e Industria de Territorio Litoral de Rusia, Zaytsev Dmitry del Centro de Exportacion y Desarrollo de Territorio Litoral de Rusia e Igor V. Agafonov, vicerepresentante de la cancilleria rusa en Vladivostok, senalaron como sigue:
					
					Atribuimos gran significacion a la feria internacional de mercancias que tiene lugar en Pyongyang.
					
					Por eso, vinimos aqui al organizar las delegaciones de gran dimension sin precedentes. Nuestro objetivo es estudiar las mercancias exportables a la RPDC y desarrollar las relaciones comerciales entre ambos pais al analizar detalladamente del comercio de la RPDC.
					
					En la exhibicion que tuvo lugar en el otono del ano pasado en esta capital, sentimos que la RPDC tiene la potencialidad.
					
					Tenemos gran interes en el desarrollo economico de la RPDC, nuestro vecino.
					
					La camara y el centro mencionados reciben ayuda directa del estado.
					
					Estamos trazando el plan de largo plazo para consolidar el desarrollo economico con la RPDC. Su dimension es inmensa, pero lo cumpliremos sin falta.
					
					El proximo ano, vendran los socios rusos mas que este ano.
					
					Se ha renovado notablemente la ciudad de Pyongyang. Presenciamos tirando fotos el panorama de la ciudad en nuestra residencia Hotel Coryo de Pyongyang. Sentimos que se construyeron muchas avenidas y los rascacielos y la ciudad de Pyongyang se hace mas majestuosa.
					
					Al margen de la direccion del lider coreano, es imposible pensar en la vertiginosa velocidad del desarrollo de Pyongyang.
